Class Player

java.lang.Object
  Player

public class Player
extends java.lang.Object

Player of the maze game. Contains all player information including name, character, location, status (dead or alive), inventory items, and statistics involving number of enemies killed and number of treasure collected.

Author:
Gavin Tam

Constructor Detail

Player

public Player(java.lang.String name,
              java.lang.String character)
Constructor for a player of the maze.

Parameters:
name - the name of the player.
character - the character chosen by the player. Character options are shown in the option panel.
Method Detail

getName

public java.lang.String getName()
Gets the name of the player.

Returns:
the name of the player.

setName

public void setName(java.lang.String name)
Sets the name of the player.

Parameters:
name - the desired name for the player.

getCharacter

public java.lang.String getCharacter()
Gets the character chosen by the player. Characters are chosen at the start of the game.

Returns:
the name of the character.

setCharacter

public void setCharacter(java.lang.String character)
Set the character chosen by the player. Characters are chosen at the start of the game.

Parameters:
character - the character chosen by the player.

getLocation

public Tile getLocation()
Get the current location of the player in the maze.

Returns:
the tile where the player is currently located.

setLocation

public void setLocation(Tile t)
Update the location of the player in the maze.

Parameters:
t - the tile where the player location is to be updated to.

setDead

public void setDead(boolean dead)
Update the status of the player. The player can be dead or alive.

Parameters:
dead - if true, the player is set to dead; if false, the player is set to alive.

isDead

public boolean isDead()
Checks the status of the player.

Returns:
true if the player is dead.

isItemCollected

public boolean isItemCollected(int itemNum)
Checks if an item has been collected by player. Items that expire their time limit will not exist in the player's inventory.

Parameters:
itemNum - the ID of the item defined in Player.
Returns:
true if the item is in the player's inventory.

setItemCollected

public void setItemCollected(int itemNum,
                             boolean collected)
Update whether an item is collected or not.

Parameters:
itemNum - the ID of the item defined in Player.
collected - if true, the item is set to collected; if false, the item is set to not collected.

getNumTreasureCollected

public int getNumTreasureCollected()
Get the total number of treasure the player has collected in the game. This includes those collected in all levels of the game.

Returns:
the total number of treasure collected by the player in the game.

addNumTreasureCollected

public void addNumTreasureCollected()
Increase the total number of treasure collected by the player by one.

getEnemyKilled

public int getEnemyKilled()
Get the total number of enemies killed by the player. This includes those killed in all levels of the game.

Returns:
the total number of enemies killed by the player.

addEnemyKilled

public void addEnemyKilled()
Increase the total number of enemies killed by the player by one.

clearStats

public void clearStats()
Clear all player stats, including location, status, inventory, number of treasure collected, and number of enemies killed.

clearInventory

public void clearInventory()
Clear all inventory items of the player.
